summary: When you are blocking with shield incoming magic damage will be decreased and you can change value of magic resist via Mod Configuration Menu (20% by default). Will combine with Elemental Protection perk.
descriptionHtml:
When you are blocking with shield incoming magic damage will be decreased and you can change value of magic resist via Mod Configuration Menu (20% by default). Will combine with Elemental Protection perk.

How does it work
Mod doesn't change change anything. Adds a new perk, it's not displayed in perk tree. Perk will be added to your character after loading game. When you change the value of resistance in MCM, script will change this value in the perk.
This perk works just like Elemental Protection perk from Block perk tree, but it works for all kinds of magic.

Compatibility
Compatible with everything.
author: Genebriss
